pl3xmap.screen.options.title: Pl3xMap
pl3xmap.screen.options.renderer.title: Map Item Renderer
pl3xmap.screen.options.renderer.fog-of-w: Toggle fog of war for the in-game map renderer
pl3xmap.screen.options.minimap.title: Minimap Options
pl3xmap.screen.options.minimap.north-loc: Sets if the minimap should lock with the north position facing up
Choose between circular and square minimap shapes
pl3xmap.screen.options.minimap.direction: Shows the cardinal directions around the minimap
pl3xmap.screen.options.minimap.coordinat: Shows your coordinates under the minimap
pl3xmap.screen.options.minimap.update-in:
How many ticks between updates
Note: Lower values may cause lag
pl3xmap.screen.options.minimap.position-: Set the position, size, and zoom of the minimap
pl3xmap.error.server.incompatible: This server is running an incompatible Pl3xMap version
